document_data.caption: A map showing Taham north of Hiyal.
document_data.name: Taham
document_data.mainbody: '''Taham''' was a small isolated town found at the foot of the [[Furrowed Mountains]] on the fringes of the [[Haunted Lands]] of [[interior Zakhara]].
document_data.Geography: Taham was on the southeast slope of the Furrowed Mountains approximately {{SI|150|mi|k|long=yes}} northeast of [[Hiyal]]. The surrounding terrain was mostly brushland with a seasonal river providing a source of water during certain parts of the year. A landrise helped isolate Taham from the north. Taham was found along a caravan route connected to Hiyal.
